content: crochet doily coaster you will need ​ small ball of scrap worsted weight yarn - about 16 yards honestly these are so small that i ve used tiny scraps balls of yarn that i didn t think would be big enough for anything else those little leftover bits when you re done with a project are perfect for this size e 4-3 50 mm hook g if you crochet tight abbreviations ​ chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet st = stitch instructions ​ to start - slip knot chain 4 slip_stitch in 1st chain to make a circle ​ round 1 - chain 2 counts as double_crochet double_crochet 13 times aroud 4-chain circle inserting hook into the ​ center of the circle not into the individual chain loops join by slip_stitch in top of the chain 2 from the start of the round 14 st total round 2 - chain 2 counts as double_crochet 2 double_crochet in top of next double_crochet and each double_crochet around 1dc in slip_stitch that ​ connected previous round slip_stitch in top of chain 2 at start of round 28 st total round 3 - chain 1 counts as single_crochet skip next st 5 double_crochet in next st makes a 5 double_crochet shell skip ​ next st *single_crochet in next st skip next st make a 5 double_crochet shell in next st skip next st * repeat from * to * around slip_stitch in top of chain 1 at beginning of round round 4 - chain 2 counds as double_crochet 7 double_crochet in the top of the 3rd double_crochet of the 1st 5-double_crochet shell *double_crochet in ​ the next single_crochet 7 double_crochet in the top of the 3rd double_crochet of the next 5 double_crochet shell * repeat from * to * around slip_stitch in top of chain 2 at the beginning of the round round 5 - slip_stitch in 1st double_crochet of the next 7-double_crochet shell chain 3 *slip_stitch in the next double_crochet chain 3* repeat ​ from * to * 4 more times slip_stitch in 7th double_crochet of the 7-double_crochet shell repeat between and around ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ slip_stitch in beginning slip_stitch trim yarn and weave in ends
